nodes.text: One of several Wisties held as a slaves in Gardulla Besadii the Elder's pleasure garden in that Hutt's palace near the city of Mos Espa on the planet Tatooine, a Wistie helped the Ghostling Princess Arawynne attempt to escape the garden when the Dug Podracer Sebulba sent a team to recapture the escaped Ghostling children. The Wistie scouted ahead and informed Arawynne of the whereabouts of the Sakiyan bounty hunter Djas Puhr. The intelligence helped Arawynne lure the Sakiyan into a pit trap created by the Ghostlings.
